document.full_text: led by alex ovechkin, the washington capitals dumped the new york rangers 3-1 on saturday to advance to the second round of the stanley cup playoffs and bury memories of last year's post-season collapse.
document.title: capitals clinch series, tampa thump penguins
lines_and_colors: led by alex ovechkin, the washington capitals dumped the new york rangers 3-1 on saturday to advance to the second round of the stanley cup playoffs and bury memories of last year's post-season collapse.
